body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Hotel Royale customer support. My name is Kenneth Sanchez. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Katherine. Could you please provide me with your room number and the date of your check-in, both in words, to assist you better with your concern?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my room number is two five zero five, and I checked in on the thirtieth of July.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing your room number and check-in date, Katherine. Could you also let me know which amenities you are experiencing issues with?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm facing issues with the air conditioning and the Wi-Fi in my room.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear about the inconveniences, Katherine. Please be assured that we will look into these problems promptly. Thank you for bringing this to our attention.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Katherine. If you need further assistance, feel free to reach out. Thank you and have a great day!
